title: A Tree is planted
creator_credit: Campbell Harper Films and Films of Scotland
brief_description: An account of the work of re-afforestation being carried out year by year in Scotland. Shows the men who work in the Scottish forests and stresses the vital need for reafforestation and tree care, pointing to the numerous skills which are part of the everyday job.
creator_credit_for_label: Campbell Harper Films and Films of Scotland
